WorkItem.Description:
My client would like to see values to three decimal places on the chart Y Axis (e.g. 0.001), but these get truncated to two decimal places and I can find no way to set the precision through properties.
Â 
Would be nice to have the ability to work with axis values more precise than two decimal places without having to use different units of measure (e.g. I want to be able to display 0.001 metres, and not have to multiply the values by 1,000 and display the scale in millimeters)
WorkItem.Summary: LinearAxis Precision - truncates values to two decimal places
